data.name: Rollers of the Realm: Reunion Demo
data.detailed_description:
Join the Rogue, Knight, Mage and Healer on an epic campaign to travel between worlds and reunite lost civilizations to battle an unearthed ancient menace.

Battle enemies above, below, and beyond. Make friends and allies. Platform and parkour through medieval cities and underground labyrinths. Solve puzzles and navigate mazes.

Rollers of the Realm: Reunion offers an award-winning gameplay mashup for players of all skill levels.


CAMPAIGN
  • Fantasy story world with cheeky, lovable characters
  • Master 24 pinball playfields, 30+ missions and random encounters
  • Robust collection, quest and progression system.
  • Replayable playfields with new goals and challenges.
  • Mini-bosses and bosses
EXTRAS
  • Ranked Mode: compete for high scores on 5 playfields.
  • Split-Flipper: 2-player couch co-op with split controls.
MIN/MAX YOUR PARTY
  • Manage a party of 5 pinball heroes with unique stats, abilities and upgrades
STRATEGY & SKILL
  • Hot swap hero roster during play for tactical advantage.
PINBALL PLUS
  • Flip into enemies to fight, roll, dash and bounce to navigate mazes and maps
  • Unleash mighty Abilities or aim and shoot your ball with Dash.

  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
